about.seo_description: Learn about AdoptMe - our mission to connect loving families with pets in need. Discover our story, values, and commitment to animal welfare.
about.title: About AdoptMe
about.hero_subtitle: We're on a mission to connect loving families with pets in need, making the adoption process simple, transparent, and joyful.
about.story_p1: AdoptMe was born from a personal passion to learn and a deep desire to give back. I started building this platform as a way to challenge myself and master modern software engineering, but the vision was always bigger than just code‚Äîit was about community support.
about.story_p2: I believe that technology is at its best when it helps people. By creating AdoptMe, I wanted to build a bridge between technology and compassion, providing a free, accessible space where our community can foster connections and help animals in need.
about.story_p3: This project is a labor of love and a continuous learning journey. Every feature is built with the hope of making adoption easier and ensuring that every pet finds the loving home they deserve. Thank you for being part of this story and for supporting our mission to make a difference.
about.compassion_desc: Every decision we make prioritizes the well-being of animals and the families who love them.
about.trust_desc: We verify listings and promote responsible adoption practices to protect both pets and adopters.
about.community_desc: We believe in the power of community to create positive change for animals everywhere.
about.innovation_desc: We continuously improve our platform to make pet adoption easier and more accessible.
about.mission_title: Creating a world where every pet has a home
about.mission_desc: We strive to reduce the number of homeless pets by making adoption the first choice for families looking to add a furry member. Through technology, community engagement, and partnerships with shelters, we're building a future where no pet is left behind.
about.join_desc: Whether you're looking to adopt, foster, or support our cause, there's a place for you in our community.

privacy.seo_desc: AdoptMe Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to AdoptMe ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
intro.p2: This policy applies to users in the United States, Canada, Mexico, and Latin America (LATAM), and complies with applicable privacy laws including the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) in Canada, the Ley Federal de Protecci√≥n de Datos Personales en Posesi√≥n de los Particulares (LFPDPPP) in Mexico, and applicable data protection regulations in other LATAM jurisdictions.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.p1: When you register for an account or use our services, we may collect:
collection.l1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number with country code)
collection.l5: Communications with other users and with us
collection.l5b: Verification data (email verification codes, SMS verification codes)
collection.p2: When you access our services, we automatically collect:
collection.l6: Device information (browser type, operating system, device type)
collection.l7: IP address and general location data
collection.l8: Usage data (pages visited, time spent, clicks)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.p1: We use the information we collect to:
usage.l2: Verify your email address and phone number for account security
usage.l3: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
usage.l4: Facilitate pet adoption connections between users
usage.l5: Process and respond to your inquiries
usage.l6: Send administrative communications, verification codes, and service updates
usage.l9: Detect, prevent, and address fraud or security issues

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and store information. These include:
cookies.l1: Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality
cookies.l2: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how users interact with our site
cookies.l3: Advertising cookies: Used by Google AdSense to display relevant ads
cookies.p2: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may limit your ability to use some features of our services.

third_party.title: 5. Third-Party Services
third_party.p1: We use third-party services that may collect information about you:
third_party.l1: Google AdSense: Displays advertisements on our platform. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits. You can opt out of personalized advertising at Google Ads Settings.
third_party.l2: Twilio: Provides SMS verification services. When you verify your phone number, Twilio processes your phone number to deliver verification codes. Twilio's privacy policy governs their use of this data.
third_party.l3: Email service providers: Deliver verification emails and service communications.
third_party.l4: Analytics providers: Help us analyze website usage and improve our services.

sharing.title: 6. How We Share Your Information
sharing.p1: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharing.l1: With other users: Pet listings and profile information are visible to other users to facilitate adoptions
sharing.l2: Service providers: Third parties who perform services on our behalf
sharing.l3: Legal requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
sharing.l4: Business transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
sharing.p2: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your data, but we continuously work to protect your information.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.p1: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. We may retain certain information as required by law or for legitimate business purposes, such as resolving disputes and enforcing our agreements.

data_management.title: 9. Account and Data Management
data_management.p1: You can delete your account at any time through your profile settings. When you delete your account:
data_management.l1: Your profile information will be permanently deleted
data_management.l2: Your pet listings will be removed
data_management.l3: Your posts and comments will be anonymized or deleted
data_management.l4: Some data may be retained as required by law
data_management.p2: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate our terms. Our enforcement system uses a three-strike policy for most violations, with immediate suspension possible for severe violations such as fraud or illegal activity.
data_management.p3: You may request a copy of your personal data by contacting us. We will provide your data in a commonly used format within a reasonable timeframe.

rights.title: 10. Your Privacy Rights
rights.p1: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
rights.l1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.l3: Delete your account and personal data
rights.l4: Object to certain processing of your data
rights.l6: Right to know what personal information is collected
rights.l8: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell your data)
rights.l9: Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights
rights.l10: Right to access your personal information
rights.l11: Right to challenge accuracy and completeness
rights.l12: Right to withdraw consent (subject to legal restrictions)
rights.l13: Derechos ARCO: Access, Rectification, Cancellation, and Opposition
rights.l15: Right to limit use or disclosure of your data
rights.l16: Right to access your personal information
rights.l18: Right to erasure of your data (subject to legal requirements)
rights.l19: Rights under applicable local data protection laws
rights.p2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

children.title: 11. Children's Privacy
children.p1: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age (or 16 in some jurisdictions). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to delete such information.

international.title: 12. International Data Transfers
international.p1: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. When we transfer your data, we take appropriate safeguards to ensure your information remains protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

changes.title: 13. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:
